title: Red Planet Pals
logline: A lonely robot on Mars forms an unlikely friendship with a curious alien creature in the ancient ruins of the red planet.
key_scenes: Zeta and N'Terra discover an ancient Martian city
Zeta and N'Terra get stuck in a ancient Martian trap
Zeta and N'Terra find a way to communicate with each other
image_requirements: A curious, alien creature with glowing eyes
